name: Climbing Tower (Dot Project)
description:
Prove your skills, find a key and finish as many levels as you possibly can.

* Run, jump, and grab different objects to find an exit and go to the next level.

* Find a key, which will help you to get past the doors on your way through the levels.

* Beware of deadly obstacles such as chainsaws, cannons and spikes!

* Prove that you can reach places that others failed to reach.

* Try to be faster by making perfect sequences of moves without any mistakes.

* Are you ready to finish all 25 levels?
